title: Alliance Technologies
question1: Have you been in close contact with someone diagnosed with COVID-19?
question2: To your knowledge, have you been exposed to the coronavirus which causes COVID-19?
question3: Are you currently experiencing any of the following symptoms or have you experienced any of them in the last 24 hours?
question1Details: The Centers for Disease Control (CDC) defines close contact as being within approximately 6 feet (2 meters) of a person with COVID-19 for a prolonged period of time (greater than 10â€“15 minutes). Examples include: caring for, living with a family member/friend or sharing a healthcare waiting area or room, or having direct contact with infectious secretions of a person with COVID-19 (such as being coughed or sneezed on).
question3Details: Cough, Fever, Chills, Repeated Shaking with Chills, Shortness of breath, Difficulty breathing, Muscle pains, Headache, Sore throat, New loss of taste or smell
